page.title: 07Trade
page.content: Shopping There are no shops in our area except the post office which sells sweets and ice creans. There are two bakers vans and two butchers vans travelling from house to house and the milk van calls on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays.The bakers also sell some provisions and groceries.One of the bakers is based in Ponteland and has called on Tuesdays and Thursdays for many years. Local shopping is done in Rothbury. Some go as far as Alnwick or Morpeth, and into Newcastle for major shopping including Christmas shopping.Some people, who are in business, are able to bulk buy at Wholesalers,the nearest being in Morpeth.
